# include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    string A, B;
    int i, j;
    int n; cin>>n;
    while(n--){
        cin>>A;
        cin>>B;
        for(i = 0; i<6; i++){
            if(A[i]==B[0]){
                for(j = 0; j<5; j++){
                    if(A[i+j]!=B[j])break;
                }
                if(j==5)break;
            }
        }
        if(j==5){cout<<1<<endl;}
        else {cout<<0<<endl;}
    }
    return 0;
}
